title: PBE help
body:
About last year I got a message saying that i got accepted for PBE but sadly me being stupid, i closed it before clicking anything .
So now im wondering if theres anyway of accessing it now. OCE server btw

replies.body:
[PBE signups are currently closed](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/EGhTBUV6-pbe-signups-are-closed) and any emails that were sent out previously and had not been acted on won't be able to fully undergo the accepting process until further notice. 

Like Talon said, a level 30 account in NA, EUNE and EUW is needed.
Cant get pbe on oce server, need another server's account at lv 30 before can be accepted
